name: Driving Insanity (SundayRenegades)
description:
Will you take fate into your own hands or fall down into madness? 

Join us in Driving Insanity where driving has never been more INSANE!!

Dodge through obstacles, pace yourself with limited resources and survive the endless horror that awaits you during the night. 

Driving Insanity is a PC platform game as well as compatible with PS4 controls.
